posts.post_title: FS: The Glory of Their Times 4xCD Set! $20
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone,

Up for sale is a "Glory of Their Times" 4xCD set. Really neat and quality audio material from several T206 era players including Crawford, Marquard, etc. I found it laying about and does not appear to have been played. $20 dlvd. through Paypal.

James
